features.title: Quick Start
features.headline: Welcome to Coordel
features.content: This Quick Start Wizard will get you familiar with some of Coordel's features. You can access it anytime from your preferences.

features.title: Smarter Tasks
features.headline: Goodbye e-mail
features.content: Instead of free text that leaves room for miscommunication, Tasks give specific instructions, deadlines and deliverables. Everything you need to do your work is right there in front of you.

features.title: current tasks
features.headline: Track work you can do right now
features.content: What’s next? Your Coordel Current list automatically gathers the unblocked tasks you have agreed to, so you can easily decide on what to do next.

features.title: deferred tasks
features.headline: Track work you will start later
features.content: Set the defer date of a task to when you intend to start work on it. Everyone involved will be notified. Forget e-mail that starts with “when do you think you will…”

features.title: delegated tasks
features.headline: Track your delegated work
features.content: When you delegate some or much of your work, it’s easy to lose sight of who is doing what for you. Coordel provides effortless tracking of your delegated tasks in one overview.

features.title: blocked tasks
features.headline: Set it and forget it
features.content: No more “Are you done yet?” Define the tasks that are blocking your work, and Coordel notifies you immediately when they are done and you can get started on your task.

features.title: private tasks
features.headline: Sometimes, it’s your business only
features.content: Coordel is not just for teamwork. When you need to do something that doesn't involve someone else, drop it into your Private list.

features.title: turbo wizard
features.headline: Get your day started
features.content: Do it, delegate it or defer it… Turbo your way through your to do list when you start your day. You are ready to roll in 1-2-3 easy steps.

features.title: deadline calendar
features.headline: Track all deadlines in one place
features.content: Coordel automatically organizes all your tasks by deadline into one overview. The result: easy management of your to do list and transparent communication about deliverables.

features.title: explicit invitations
features.headline: Agree or decline new work requests
features.content: In Coordel, you accept or decline new work. It’s the one-click solution to “I thought you were going to do that?”

features.title: explict issue handling
features.headline: Raise and Clear Issues in real time
features.content: Coordel lets you raise an issue with a task that was assigned to you with just one click. Ownership transfers immediately to the Coord responsible to clear it. No miscommunication, no confusion.

features.title: explicit completion
features.headline: Submit & agree on completed tasks
features.content: Rather than think you're done and find out later you're not, Coordel provides a built-in agreement process so everyone is clear on what has been completed.

features.title: stream
features.headline: Spend your time doing work, not writing about it
features.content: Say goodbye to the time-consuming status e-mail. Take action and Coordel will immediately inform everyone involved.

features.title: deliverables
features.headline: Everything you need, where you expect it to be
features.content: Rather than searching for the file or email, Coordel makes sure what you need to get your work done is right where you expect it to be.

features.title: Task Workspace
features.headline: Your work in one go-to place
features.content: How much time do you spend looking for that one e-mail or file? Coordel gives you one Workspace where you plan, execute and deliver your work. From the briefing to the deliverables, it’s all there, neatly organized in one overview.

features.title: Blocked Deliverables
features.headline: The 1-2-3 of getting your work done
features.content: Sometimes, there are different steps to getting even a simple task done. Use Coordel to define the order in which a task will be executed. How’s that for efficient?

features.title: feedback
features.headline: What do you think?
features.content: Forget formal evaluations. We’re talking about constant improvement, one job at a time. Coordel gives you the opportunity to share lessons learned when you’re done with the work, before moving on to the next one.

features.title: blueprints
features.headline: Get it right & re-use
features.content: Coordel helps you get the most out of your expertise. When you have captured a job well done in tasks or Coords, Coordel lets you blueprint and re-use them with just one click.

features.title: alerts
features.headline: Live updates
features.content: With Coordel, you don’t miss a thing. When a task or Coord you are involved in changes, an audio and visual alert lets you know. Even when you’re not logged on, Coordel will track your alerts so they are waiting for you when you check in.

features.title: Coords
features.headline: Coordinate your work with others
features.content: What's in a word? In the case of Coords, it is communication, agreements, productivity, transparency and accountability. Coords enable you to get work started, and completed, with one or more other people in just a few clicks. Don’t just take our word for it. Try it!

features.title: People
features.headline: Choose your own team
features.content: Coordel is about letting you do the work you do best, with the people who complement you best. Coordel automatically keeps track of past and present team members and shows what they are doing and how well they do it.
